__e: Hey, I just wanna thank you so much for keeping me on despite the--
I should be thanking you for letting me be a part of all this.
I rang her to say thank you for letting me stay at her house after you drove off without me.
And, incidentally, sir, we both really wanted to thank you for dinner last night.
Well, let me be the first to thank you for the giant pile of crap you've left us to deal with.
I think I speak for us all when I thank you for your patience.
And I want to say thank you for everything you've done for me for the last seven years.
I just wanted to thank you for everything that you and your men have done for me and Rukovia.
As the representative of the people, I should thank you for everything that you do for us people despite the cold and heat.
Oh, it's just a little something to say thank you for giving me the greatest gift in the world:
And...this is to thank you for what you are doing for me.
The least we can do to show our gratitude for all the wealth she's given us.
Well, I can't thank you enough for saving my partner, and I really hate to be a buzzkill here, but there are still three bodies that are unaccounted for.
I can't thank you enough for coming out here and helping me out like this.
I really can't thank you enough.
